title: Parliament House decorated, illuminated to welcome OIC-CFM participants
content:
ISLAMABAD, March 21 (APP): Arrangements for the 48th session of the OIC Council of Foreign Ministers at the Parliament House Islamabad have been finalized.
To welcome the worthy guests, red carpets have been rolled out at the entrance of the parliament building. Both Houses of the parliament are beautifully illuminated and decorated.
The OIC-CFM session is being held on March 22-23.
